data.name: Sayonara Golden Days - Golden Souls
data.detailed_description:
The DLC will does not affect really affect the game, but you can consider purchasing it if you like the game.

This DLC includes:

  • A cheating method to skip the current level
  • A real commentary track
  • Some art and audios related to the game
  • Some irrelevant cat pictures that may make you smile

Note:

The aforementioned cheating method is available without the DLC.

How to Get:

You can find the files in the game folder once you've download the game.

data.short_description: A Sayonara, Golden Days DLC. Please play the game first before purchasing it.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: My grandpa's PC can run it
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: My potato can run it
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: My toaster can run it well enough
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
